# Course Materials and References {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}


## Kevin McGarigal's pages

Kevin is a retired professor in the Department of Environmental Conservation here at UMass.

He was the previous instructor for ECo 602 and 634 (and many other ECo courses).

His Landscape Ecology page is still available (as of July 2020).  It contains lots of great materials on ECo 602/634 and his other courses.

Some of the readings for the current course's readings are based on Kevin's materials.

- https://www.umass.edu/landeco/
